model_settings.default_system_prompt: You are MiniCPM-V, a helpful, concise and knowledgeable vision-language assistant. Answer directly and stay on task.

prompt_types.Caption: Write a concise caption for this image.
prompt_types.Analyze: Analyze the main elements and scene in this image.
prompt_types.Identify: What objects and subjects do you see in this image?
prompt_types.Explain: Explain what's happening in this image.
prompt_types.List: List the main objects visible in this image.
prompt_types.Scene: Describe the scene and setting of this image.
prompt_types.Details: What are the key details in this image?
prompt_types.Summarize: Summarize the key content of this image in 1-2 sentences.
prompt_types.Emotion: Describe the emotions or mood conveyed by this image.
prompt_types.Style: Describe the artistic or visual style of this image.
prompt_types.Location: Where might this image be taken? Analyze the setting or location.
prompt_types.Question: What question could be asked based on this image?
prompt_types.Creative: Describe this image as if writing the beginning of a short story.
prompt_types.Video Analyze: Analyze the main elements and scene in this video.
prompt_types.Video Identify: What objects and subjects do you see in this video?
prompt_types.Video Explain: Explain what's happening in this video.
prompt_types.Video List: List the main objects visible in this video.
prompt_types.Video Scene: Describe the scene and setting of this video.
prompt_types.Video Details: What are the key details in this video?

MiniCPM-V-4-int4.description: V4.0 4-bit quantized version, smaller memory footprint

MiniCPM-V-4.5.name: openbmb/MiniCPM-V-4_5
MiniCPM-V-4.5.description: Latest V4.5 version with enhanced capabilities

MiniCPM-V-4.name: openbmb/MiniCPM-V-4
